bdy.p:
Argan Oils is an American, international company. Headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, Argan Oils manufactures botanical organic products based on
Argan
Oil. Argan Oil also known, as "Liquid Gold" is an organic cold pressed oil extracted from the Argania Spinosa, a tree indigenous to Morocco.

Argan Oils adopts a philosophy. Empowering women cooperatives who produce Argan oil which is fairly traded, protecting the endangered Argan forest, declared in 1999 as a World biosphere reserve by the
UNESCO
, Through a grass-roots approach, Argan Oils promotes cultural preservation and economic integrity in the communities where it operates. References
